Patek Philippe

Grand Complications Ladies' Minute Repeater

7040/250G-001


Price on request *
*Suggested retail price, including taxes. Prices may be subject to alteration at any time and do not constitute a contract.
test

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Movement:

    Mechanical self-winding movement

  • Case Material:

    White Gold

  • Case Diameter:

    36.00 mm

  • Case Back:

    Interchangeable solid and sapphire crystal case backs

  • Dial:

    Blue Enamel Hand-guilloched With A Swirling Pattern (Flinqué Enamel), Gold Printed Hour Markers. 18K Gold Dial Plate.

  • Water Resistance:

    N.A.

  • Power Reserve:

    48 hours

  • Complications:

    Minute repeater

  • Strap:

    Alligator strap with square scales, hand-stitched, ocean blue patinated. Diamond-set prong buckle.
